submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        p = 10**9+7 
        n = len(nums)
        n1= nums[0]
        d = [1 for i in range(n1+1)]
        for i in range(1, n):
            n2 =  nums[i]
            n1 = nums[i-1]
            d2 = [0 for i in range(n2+1)]
            for a1 in range(nums[i-1]+1):
                for a2  in range(n2+1):
                    if 0 <= a2 <= n2 and a1 <= a2 and n1-a1 >= n2-a2:
                        d2[a2]+=d[a1]
            d = d2
        return sum(d) % p

        #a1   <= a2  ... an
        #n1-a1 >= n2-a2 ...
        #a1 <= a2 <= n2-n1+a1
        #0 <= a2  <= n2
        #a1 <= a2 <= n2-n1+a1
